name: Mage Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner wizard! Conjure up the perfect mystical moniker with our Mage Name Generator. Whether you're crafting a character for your next RPG campaign, writing a fantasy novel, or just feeling magical, we've got the incantations to help you find a name that resonates with arcane power.
introduction: Tired of generic mage names? Yearning for a title that truly reflects your magical prowess? Look no further! Our Mage Name Generator is a cauldron bubbling with creativity, ready to brew the perfect name for your sorcerer, enchantress, or warlock. Prepare to be spellbound!
howToUse: 1. Stare intensely at the 'Generate' button. Channel your inner mage.
2. Click the button (or tap it, if you're on a magical touchscreen).
3. Behold! A brand new, totally awesome mage name appears before your very eyes.
4. Not feeling it? No problem! Click again. We've got enough names to fill the Library of Alexandria (the magical section, of course).
5. Found the perfect name? Hooray! Go forth and conquer (responsibly, of course... maybe just conquer a particularly tough Sudoku puzzle).

faqs.question: Is this generator really magical?
faqs.answer: While we can't *guarantee* actual magic, we've poured a whole lot of imagination and fun into it. So, yes, it's practically magical!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Yes, please do! We'd be honored. Just promise to vanquish evil in our name.

faqs.question: Are the names generated original?
faqs.answer: We strive for originality! While some names might have echoes of classic fantasy, our generator combines prefixes and suffixes in unique ways to create fresh and exciting options.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! We have countless combinations. Or, use it as inspiration to come up with your own unique twist.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: While we don't claim copyright over the generated names, it's always a good idea to do a quick search to ensure the name isn't already in use, especially if you're planning on using it for a product or business.

faqs.question: Will using this generator make me a better mage in real life?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But you'll definitely have a cooler name when you're LARPing or playing video games! That's gotta count for something, right?
